title: Analysis: Trump revealed a lot about his tax returns
description: • John Kelly to friends: Trump is 'the most flawed person' I've ever known

title: Georgia's race to the right prompts GOP fears over holding Senate majority
description: She's cut an ad saying she's "more conservative than Attila the Hun." She's lashed out at the WNBA for its ties to Black Lives Matter. And she frequently promotes herself as having a "100 percent Trump voting record."

title: Ex-chief of staff criticizes Trump to friends
description: Former White House chief of staff, retired Marine Gen. John Kelly, has told friends that President Donald Trump "is the most flawed person" he's ever known.

title: Reporter solves mystery of nodding woman at Trump town hall
description: CNN's Brianna Keilar talks to Alex Daugherty of the Miami Herald about Mayra Joli, the woman seen enthusiastically nodding behind President Donald Trump during his town hall appearance on NBC.

title: I thought 'flights to nowhere' were silly. Then I went on one.
description: I have been on quite a few flights where people clapped when the plane landed. But this was the first time I'd been on a plane where everybody clapped at takeoff.

title: US reaches 8 million Covid-19 cases, signaling a tough winter ahead
description:
• Europe nations smash Covid-19 records
• These families cherished multi-generational living. But Covid-19 has wrecked it
• London despairs at new Covid rules
• LIVE: WHO 'very worried' about Europe's second wave, but discourages lockdowns

title: European nations smash Covid-19 records as WHO warns daily deaths could surpass April peak
Judge suggests White House counsel is overriding Trump's position on Russia docs
description: A federal judge -- sensing the White House may be overriding the orders of President Donald Trump as he flails against the Russia investigation -- has given the Justice Department five days to explain Trump's true wishes on declassifying all Mueller investigation documents.

title: Man decapitated in Paris suburb, France's anti-terror prosecutor says
description: France's anti-terror prosecutor said on Friday it was investigating the decapitation of a man in a suburb of Paris.

title: Boeing is nearing a long-delayed approval for the grounded 737 Max
description: Boeing appears close to securing key regulatory approvals for its grounded 737 Max to fly again — a potential lifeline for the struggling plane maker.

title: Trump administration hypes immigration enforcement in key swing state ahead of election
description: When the idea of erecting billboards of immigration violators initially came up at least a year ago, US Immigration and Customs Enforcement officials didn't think much of it. The proposal was considered to be a low priority, according to two sources familiar with the discussions.

title: Report reveals 'long-simmering racial tensions' in New York State courts
description: A report that was made public Thursday reveals "long-simmering racial tensions" among court officers and racist statements made openly by attorneys, judges, and other courthouse personnel in New York State courts.

title: Two Thai protesters could face life imprisonment for violence against the Queen
description: Two activists in Thailand have been arrested on charges of attempting violence against the Queen, which could result in a possible life sentence.

title: More people watched Biden on ABC than Trump on NBC, MSNBC and CNBC combined
description: Joe Biden's town hall on ABC averaged 13.9 million viewers on Thursday night, easily surpassing the Nielsen ratings for President Trump's town hall on NBC. That alone was a result virtually no one in the TV business expected. And that's not even the most surprising part.

title: US authorities investigating if recently published emails are tied to Russian disinformation effort targeting Biden
description: US authorities are investigating whether recently published emails that purport to detail the business dealings of Joe Biden's son in Ukraine and China are connected to an ongoing Russian disinformation effort targeting the former vice president's campaign, a US official and a congressional source briefed on the matter said.

title: In contrasting town halls, the real duel was Trump vs. Guthrie
Finland PM's photoshoot sparks sexism debate
description: A photoshoot involving Finland's Prime Minister, Sanna Marin, has sparked a debate about sexism in the country.

title: These futuristic concept cars from the 1950s are up for auction with a $20 million estimate
description: A trio of rarely seen, futuristic concept cars from the 1950s are going up for auction at Sotheby's, with an estimated value of up to $20 million.

title: Melania Trump bashes former friend over tell-all book
description: First lady Melania Trump penned an essay on the White House website on Friday that railed against what she described as the "pettiness" of the media and ex-friend and former adviser Stephanie Winston Wolkoff.

title: Analysis: Donald Trump's new low on QAnon
description: This is an exchange that happened on planet Earth in the year 2020 between NBC's Savannah Guthrie and President Donald Trump:

title: National Park Service interns unearthed fossils of a bizarre 220-million-year-old reptile
description: A species of peculiar burrowing reptiles that evaded scientists for more than 220 million years has been found, fossilized, at last. A team of National Park Service interns are credited with its discovery.

title: The story behind one of the most Shazamed songs in the world
description: One night in 2019, DJ Kgaogelo Moagi, better known as Master KG, called up singer Nomcebo to come to his Johannesburg studio to record a song.

title: Hear from WHO's director for Europe amid surge
description: CNN's Becky Anderson speaks with the World Health Organization's Europe director Hans Kluge as countries smash records for daily coronavirus cases and the WHO warns that the daily death toll on the continent could reach five times its April peak within months.

title: Peloton recalls pedals on 27,000 exercise bikes after reported injuries
description: Peloton has issued a voluntary recall on pedals used on about 27,000 of its exercise bikes because of a reported "laceration hazard."

title: Rudy Giuliani's daughter says to vote for Biden and Harris to end Trump's 'reign of terror'
description: Caroline Giuliani, the daughter of President Donald Trump's personal attorney and former New York City mayor Rudy Giuliani, is urging Americans to "end this nightmare" by voting for Democratic nominee Joe Biden and his running mate Kamala Harris.

title: NBC host to Trump: "You're not someone's crazy uncle who can just retweet whatever"
description: Savannah Guthrie used her skills as a former litigator to interrogate President Trump during NBC's town hall.

title: Opinion: Donald Trump's horrifying QAnon dodge
description: What was the most alarming part of President Donald Trump's Thursday night town hall event?

title: Timothée Chalamet was 'embarrassed' by make-out photos with Lily-Rose Depp
description: Timothée Chalamet likes to keep his personal life private, but he has opened up about one famous photo.

title: John Legend pays tribute to 'humbling' Chrissy Teigen following baby loss
description: John Legend has spoken of his love and admiration for his wife, Chrissy Teigen, following the loss of their baby earlier this month after pregnancy complications.

title: Broadway worker: My career of 15 years vanished overnight
description: CNN's Vanessa Yurkevich speaks to Broadway employees who are out of work as a result of the coronavirus pandemic, leaving a devastating impact on theater production.

title: Two young directors want the world to see Black male joy in a 'love letter to brothers everywhere'
description: Photographer Joshua Renfroe is meticulous in his approach to making images -- from the early conceptualization stage through to exhibition. His goal is to tell a story through the final pictures but also through the process of creating them.

title: India's first Oscar winner dies age 91
description: India's first ever Oscar winner, costume designer Bhanu Athaiya, has died at the age of 91. Athaiya, dressed the casts of over 100 Bollywood movies and gained international acclaim for her work on the 1982 movie "Gandhi."

title: UK PM Boris Johnson has an expensive Brexit choice ahead
description: UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson has an expensive choice ahead.

title: The real duel was Trump vs Guthrie
description: Fact Check | Highlights | Pictures | Election Q&A | Report voting issues

title: World champion swimmer suspended following extramarital affair
description: Four-time swimming world champion Daiya Seto has vowed to "start over" after being suspended from the sport for having an extramarital affair.

title: People are buying luxury goods again. That's a good thing
description: At first glance, the number of people buying pricy leather bags may not seem like a helpful bellwether for the health of the global economy.

title: Trump's refusal to condemn QAnon guarantees to alienate at least half the US and contrasts sharply with Biden's performance at dueling town halls
description: More than 800 Americans died from Covid-19 Thursday, yet President Donald Trump still played the victim.

title: Group says it raises money to help police officers, but that's not where the money is going
description: A secretive political group has been pulling in millions of dollars in recent months amid a growing "Blue Lives Matter" movement, with a cadre of telemarketers urgently telling Americans that now is the time to support the police and keep them safe.

title: How soccer star built $30 million property empire
description: The lavish trappings of many top-flight footballers have been well documented -- flash cars, state-of-the-art houses, glistening watches and bejeweled jewelry.

title: Only two people live in this town, and they have one sacred rule about Covid
description: They're the sole inhabitants of a tiny Italian hamlet, but these elderly retirees aren't taking any chances when it comes to upholding the country's strict Covid-19 rules.

title: Belgian King meets with once-secret half-sister for first time
description: Belgium's King Philippe finally met with his once-secret half-sister, Delphine de Saxe-Cobourg, after years of royal denials surrounding the princess' paternity.

title: See Queen Elizabeth's first royal engagement since pandemic began
description: Queen Elizabeth II's first public engagement since the UK's national lockdown earlier this year has raised eyebrows, as neither the 94-year-old monarch nor Prince William wore masks. CNN's Anna Stewart reports.

title: China's Qingdao Covid cluster traced back to two dock workers, officials say
description: A coronavirus outbreak in the Chinese city of Qingdao, which prompted mass testing of millions of residents, has been traced back to two dock workers, authorities said on Friday.

title: Senators' surprising hug stirs outrage
description: CNN's Manu Raju explains why a maskless hug between Senate Judiciary Committee Chairman Lindsey Graham (R-SC) and Sen. Dianne Feinstein (D-CA) at Amy Coney Barrett's confirmation hearing is receiving criticism.

title: Fans split over Gal Gadot's casting as Cleopatra
description: The casting of the "Wonder Woman" actress Gal Gadot as the Egyptian queen Cleopatra in a new movie has stirred debate online. CNN's Chloe Melas reports.

title: Ex-Republican Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger slams California Republican Party
description: In a conversation with CNN's Don Lemon, former California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger blasted the California Republican Party, which said it will not comply with the state's cease-and-desist order over unofficial ballot drop boxes placed in at least four counties.

title: Tensions flare as Trudeau says he'll work with allies to fight China's 'coercive diplomacy'
description: China on Thursday denied it had taken two Canadian men hostage, and repeated a call for the release of a Huawei Technologies Co Ltd executive held in Canada who faces extradition to the United States amid a long-running diplomatic dispute.

title: Don Lemon presses Kamala Harris on court-packing stance
description: CNN's Don Lemon spoke with Democratic vice presidential nominee Sen. Kamala Harris about the dueling town halls between President Donald Trump and her running mate, Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden.

title: CNN commentator gave this Biden answer a D-
description: Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden would not answer whether he supports expanding the number of Supreme Court justices, but said he would answer before Election Day.

title: Almost no risk of catching Covid on a full airplane, new study claims
description: A new study released Thursday suggests that people don't need to worry about circulating air spreading coronavirus on airplanes.

title: This company is giving away bacon-scented face masks
description: Hormel Foods is giving you a chance to win a Covid-19 mask that has the aroma of bacon. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports on a mask with sizzle.
